name: Cursed (itch) (Enzo Onesti, Theo Gautier, Tom Rivaud)
name_original: Cursed (itch) (Enzo Onesti, Theo Gautier, Tom Rivaud)
description:
Deep dive into the anxiety of an ill person and fight for their survival !

| TRAILER |

| THE GAME |

Immerse yourself in the year 2056 in a cyberpunk world. At the heart of Youman Industries, a company that produces androids to integrate society. In a test room, you will have to pass various physical tests to find and face your own kind.

Jump, Run, Wall climb, Wall jump and Dash to pass obstacles on your way.

A curse represented by a creature who sucks the life of the android on which it is and can be launched and recalled at any time, it can also be used as sonar to find enemies.

Intense confrontations against enemies with the same abilities as you and which are becoming more and more powerfull as the tests progress.


| ABOUT THE PROJECT |

Student project made during 6 months for the graduation project in Game Design and Game Dev Bachelor.

| TEAM |

Axel de Conti - Producer / Lead Tech / Art

Theo Gautier - Game Designer / Programmer / Art

Enzo Onesti - Level Designer / VFX Artist

Tom Rivaud - Sound Designer / Programmer

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING OUR GAME !

Don't hesitate to give us feedback !
